description:
99999 is a fast-paced, high-score arena-shooter inspired by Super Crate Box. The goal is to earn as high a score as you can by collecting weapon drops (and changing your weapon in the process) throughout a run.

Enemies will never stop coming, so dodge-roll, wall-kick and do what you can before you get overwhelmed!Unlock a large variety of weapons as you progress through the game.
Equip unique abilities to augment your strategies.

- there are lots more than just the ones shown here!Features (work-in-progress) :
  • Tight and fluid movement. Double-jump, wall-kick and dodge-roll out of harm's way.
  • More than 30 unique weapons to choose from.
  • More than 40 special abilities. Mix and match them for the ultimate combo.
  • More than 20 hand-crafted stages, each with a different layout and enemies combination that requires different strategies to deal with.
  • Hone your skills and compare scores with others on global leaderboards!
